SEARCH
Package Users

Class Patient

java.lang.Object
Users.User
Users.Patient
public class Patient extends User
Represents a patient in the hospital management system, inheriting from the User class. The class manages the patient's medical record and provides various functionalities for the patient, including managing personal information, appointments, and viewing records.
Since:
2024-11-21

  • Constructor Details

    • Patient

      public Patient(String patientID, String patientName, String dateofBirth, String gender, String bloodType, String phoneNumber, String emailAddress, String password)
      Constructs a new Patient instance with the given details and initializes a medical record.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique ID of the patient
      patientName - the name of the patient
      dateofBirth - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      bloodType - the blood type of the patient
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the patient
      emailAddress - the email address of the patient
      password - the password for the patient account

    • Patient

      public Patient(String patientID, String patientName, String dateofBirth, String gender, String bloodType, String phoneNumber, String emailAddress, ArrayList<String> pastDiagnoses, ArrayList<String> pastTreatments, String password)
      Constructs a new Patient instance with the given details, past diagnoses, and past treatments.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique ID of the patient
      patientName - the name of the patient
      dateofBirth - the date of birth of the patient
      gender - the gender of the patient
      bloodType - the blood type of the patient
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the patient
      emailAddress - the email address of the patient
      pastDiagnoses - the list of past diagnoses for the patient
      pastTreatments - the list of past treatments for the patient
      password - the password for the patient account
